name: Doc Church
descriptions: Doc Church is a doctor who works in Megaton in the year 2277.

Doc Church used to stay alive by trading his services to raiders and slavers before he moved to Megaton. At that point, the town had been without a doctor for years. It may be a "rat infested hellhole" as he calls it, but he also says that it is the least hellish place in which he has lived.
As Megaton's only doctor, he has got a lot on his plate and does not appreciate people bothering him without good cause.
Doc Church can be found at the Megaton clinic at any given time during the day.

topics.topic: DLC03WQSickDoctorTopicFull house today, Doc. What's wrong with everybody?
topics.topic_text: Something going around, Doc? The clinic seems pretty full today.
topics.response_text: There's something going around, all right, but it isn't anything I've ever seen before. Definitely not contagious.

topics.topic_text: I think I might be addicted to something.
topics.response_text: I can take care of it for you, for a price.

topics.topic_text: I think I'll tough it out.
topics.response_text: Your choice, but an addiction ain't an easy thing to kick.

topics.topic_text: I don't have 50 caps.
topics.response_text: Well, this might go better for you if you hadn't blown your money on Jet, don't you think?

topics.topic_text: I'm hurt. I need help, Doc.
topics.response_text: Well, you're standing fine, but you could use some switching up. That'll be 50 caps.

topics.topic_text: All right, here's your money.
topics.response_text: Alright, hold still.

topics.topic_text: All right, here's your money.
topics.response_text: Here. Hold this for me while I stitch you up.

topics.topic_text: All right, here's your money.
topics.response_text: Alright, now stand still. This'll only take a second.

topics.topic_text: That's all I need.
topics.response_text: Alright then.

topics.topic_text: There was something else I needed...
topics.response_text: Well, speak up then. I don't have all day.

topics.topic_text: On second thought, I'll be fine.
topics.response_text: Then stop wasting my time.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Alright, that should do it. You need anything else?

topics.topic_text: Do you know anything about some android who needed a surgeon?
topics.response_text: Some VIP from up north looking for surgery and computer expertise. I don't pay attention to that crap, and neither should you.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about this android from the Commonwealth?
topics.response_text: Thought that hoax was long in the grave. Here take this holotape and hear it for yourself. That was just some bored prankster. Forget about it.

topics.topic_text: Ever do any facial surgery? Maybe on someone from the Commonwealth?
topics.response_text: Damn stupid idea. That reminds me of this old hoax. Here, take a listen to this crusty holotape and see for yourself.

topics.topic_text: You ever do a face job on an android from the North? <Jingle purse of 100 caps.>
topics.response_text: Damn stupid idea. That reminds me of this old hoax. Here, take a listen to this crusty holotape and see for yourself.

topics.topic_text: A patient of mine needs a facial epidermal augmentation. You ever perform one?
topics.response_text: Damn stupid idea. That reminds me of this old hoax. Here, take a listen to this crusty holotape and see for yourself.

topics.topic_text: You know who might have a Lipoplasticator or Micro Dermal Graftilizer?
topics.response_text: Probably down at Rivet City. Anything that has any use out here, they snatch up for themselves. That damn Pinkerton don't share nothin'.

topics.topic_text: Here's 100 caps for the locale of a Lipoplasticator or Micro Dermal Graftilizer.
topics.response_text: Probably down at Rivet City. Anything that has any use out here, they snatch up for themselves. That damn Pinkerton don't share nothin'.

topics.topic_text: I need to find a Micro Dermal Graftilizer for epidermal augmentation surgery.
topics.response_text: Probably down at Rivet City. Anything that has any use out here, they snatch up for themselves. That damn Pinkerton don't share nothin'.

topics.topic_text: I need something to help me concentrate...
topics.response_text: Great. Another junkie... In case you haven't noticed, this is a clinic, not a candy store. And I've got work to do.{annoyed}

topics.topic_text: So you've got someone in town with a drug habit?
topics.response_text: I'm afraid that goes against patient-doctor confidentiality.{evasive}

topics.topic_text: A place like this is probably crawling with junkies, huh?
topics.response_text: Megaton might not be Tenpenny Tower, but that doesn't make breaking patient-doctor confidentiality any more ethical, now does it?{annoyed}

topics.topic_text: Ha! Figures a shithole like this would have a local Chem head.
topics.response_text: Okay, so we have a resident with a bit of a problem. What makes you so goddamned superior? Hmph. Wastelanders...{annoyed}

topics.topic_text: I'm only trying to help, Doc.
topics.response_text: All right look, I'm only tellin' you this because you seem like an okay sort and I'm hopin' maybe you can talk some sense into the boy.

topics.topic_text: You can trust me. I'm a doctor myself.
topics.response_text: All right, I suppose someone with medical training has to have at least a bit of compassion. And maybe you can talk some sense into the boy.

topics.topic_text: Never mind, then.
topics.response_text: Right.

topics.topic_text: I need to buy medical supplies.
topics.response_text: Plannin' on goin' out and getting' shot up, eh?

topics.topic_text: That's all I needed to know.
topics.response_text: You sure?

topics.topic: MegTownFatherChoiceI'm looking for my father. Middle-aged guy. Maybe you've seen him?
topics.topic_text: I'm looking for my father...
topics.response_text: Boy... are you botherin' me? 'Cause I think we talked about what happens when you bother me.{A long pause before speaking the text.}

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Megaton?
topics.response_text: I have to say, of all the rat infested hellholes that I've lived in, this one is the least hellish.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about the people here?
topics.response_text: I already told you about the Stahl boy's drug problem. You said you wanted to help.

topics.topic_text: What do you do around here?
topics.response_text: I'm the town doc. If it's cut, I sew it up. If it's infected, I cut it off.

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: I'm not easily manipulated. So don't bother.

conversation.response_text: You don't got nearly enough holes in you to be botherin' me.
Jesus Christ, did you set this yourself? Well, I'm gonna have to rebreak it...
